title: Jackdaws
description: Jackdaws" is one of the most stirring, successful, and popular thrillers of Ken Follett's career-a patriotic adventure that has won the hearts of readers and critics alike. But perhaps "People" magazine said it best: "Returning to the World War II setting of his bestselling thrillers "Eye of the Needle" and "The Key to Rebecca," Follett once again strikes Nazi pay dirt.
author: Ken Follett
